metadata.title: CVE-2024-0402 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from16.0 prior to 16.6.6, 16.7 prior to 16.7.4, and 16.8 prior to 16.8.1 whichallows an authenticated user to write files to arbitrary locations on theGitLab server while creating a workspace.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
